attributes.action: Ask the Inland Revenue to review the mileage rates payed for using own car at work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the current rates of 40p per mile for the 1st 10000 miles and 25p per mile for every mile after that in any tax year was brought out in 2002. fuel prices are once again rising every day
making it extremely dificult for drivers using their own vehicles for there job to fuel and maintain their vehicles to an acceptible standard.
we need a realistic rate now !!!
